 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁעַר‎</span> **verb** ==calculate, reakon== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el Jewish-Aramaic Pa\`el ***put a valuation, estimate***; Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שַׁעֲרָא‎</span> ***interest, market-price***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***market-price*** is loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>189</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנַפְשׁוֺ כֶּןהֿוּא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּמוֺשֿׁ‎</span> [[Prov.23.7|Prov 23:7]] ***as he has calculated in his soul, so is he***, but dubious: [[BDB#De|De]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁעֵר‎</span> ***as one who calculates***; more radical conjectures in [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] Toy.
